1279850.name: 《浴血黑帮：傀儡师》游戏原声OST
1279850.description:
Peaky Blinders: Mastermind Official Soundtrack

Music composed, performed and produced by Feverist :- Dan Mills // Joshua Davenport // Daisy Palmer // Callum Ryan
String arrangements by Joshua Davenport
Strings performed by John Mills (Violin) and Bozidar Vukotic (Cello)
Mix and Master by Joshua Davenport except 'Reveller' and 'The Secret' Mix and Master by David Emery
